Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (14 ll.), verso pasted down. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Transfer of rights in a Greek contract by Pachois son of Psentuot to Panobchunis son of Tuot. Date. year 8 Pachons 21 [of Ptol. Soter II] = BC. 109 June 7. The Greek contract referred to is stated to have been made in the year 34 Choiak 15, which can only be of the preceding King Euergetes II. (= BC. 136. Jan. 8) [...] cf. no. 10505 A-B." Concerning this group of texts, see entry for P BM EA 10491.
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Ed. in S. E. Thomas Cambridge PhD diss. Text 16 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (S.E. Thomas).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (313) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/313)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fair
